name: Rocco Wu's The Battle of Sheeshu High School
name_original: Rocco Wu's The Battle of Sheeshu High School
description:
Welcome to Sheeshu High School! It's your first day and you are ready to assert your dominance on your peers and show them who is da real boss in town. It's lunchtime but you are fed up, they only give you a tomato. ONE tomato. Your parents pay for such expensive tuition and the best they can serve you is one lousy tomato?!?! You feel the wrath. The heat. The frustration. Seeping through your veins and into that hot head of yours ;) The tomato is now your greatest weapon, but it can also be your downfall. Throw your tomato across the cafeteria to show them you are not to be messed with but don't hit the pretentious school representative or your crush. She will be very sad which will make you very sad as well :(

This game supports Xbox and Playstation Controllers

Controls:

Right Flipper: E/ Right Bumper

Left Flipper: Q/ Left Bumper

Plunger: Spacebar/ Right Trigger

Credits:

Rocco Wu: Designer, Engineer, UI Artist, and Audio Designer

City and road 3D assets from KENNEY.NL

Gigachad from knowyourmeme.com

Anime images from anime-planet.com

Tomato from rhcreations on sketchfab

Music by James Ignacio. Instagram: @jamesignac

Made for USC Games CTIN 484 Intermediate Games Development
